description: Deprecated operations will no longer appear in help documentation or be suggested in autocompletion results.
When creating an assume role profile, you can now specify a credential source outside of the config file using the `credential_source` key.
Adds support for the process credential provider, allowing users to specify a process to call to get credentials.
When creating an assume role profile, you can now specify another assume role profile as the source. This allows for chaining assume role calls.
Update emr command to latest version
Update shield command to latest version
Update xray command to latest version
Update storagegateway command to latest version
Update codebuild command to latest version
Update rekognition command to latest version
Update apigateway command to latest version
Idempotency tokens are no longer marked as a required argument.
Update cloudformation command to latest version
